description: one sheet; portrait of a woman looking toward PL, wearing a red and pink patterned kimono with purple and blue and black plaid trim and red undergarment with blue patterned collar; pink petals falling around woman
markings: Artist’s seal: たいそ {Taiso} | Carver’s seal: 彫勇 {hori Yū}

portfolio: From Thirty-two Aspects of Behaviors (Fūzoku sanjūnisō 風俗三十二相)
text: No. 21 on the table of contents
title: Appearing Eager to Meet, Behavior of a Prostitute of the Kaei Era
